item.title: A-FedPD: Aligning Dual-Drift is All Federated Primal-Dual Learning Needs
item.description: A-FedPD tackles federated learning’s ‘dual drift’ problem by aligning global and local dual variables, resulting in faster convergence and enhanced stability for primal-dual methods.
